name: Dragon Break Classic
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
Dragon Break Classic is an arcade game that lets the user break pixel fantasy characters with a unique shield paddle and ball. Unique animated fantasy pixel levels, Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!


Offline single player
Enhanced game play on PS4 Pro console
